00037 /** 
00038  * \file threshold.c
00039  * \brief Implementation for \ref Threshold module.
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/modules/threshold.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.69 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/09/23 02:20:15 $

00046 // C library includes
00047 #include <stdio.h>
00048 #include <stdlib.h>
00049 #include <string.h>
00050 
00051 // fc library dependencies
00052 #include "base.h"
00053 #include "storage.h"
00054 #include "library.h"
00055 #include "variable.h"
00056 #include "variableP.h"
00057 #include "subset.h"

00061 #include "threshold.h"

00063 /**
00064  * \addtogroup Threshold
00065  * \brief Apply thresholds to variables.
00066  */
00067 
00068 /**
00069  * \ingroup  Threshold
00070  * \brief Create thresholded region.
00071  *
00072  * \description
00073  * 
00074  *     Takes a variable and a reference value, and creates a subset of entities
00075  *     whose data values pass the threshold test given by the comparison
00076  *     string. Possible
00077  *     values of this string: <b> ">","<",">=","<=","=","==","=>","=<" </b> .
00078  *
00079  * \modifications 
00080  *    - Nancy Collins  Created.
00081  *    - 11/26/03 WSK added return of association type & cleaned up
00082  *    - 04/12/04 RM, changed input int compare, to string (one of "<",">"
00083  *          "<=", ">=","=<","=>","=","=="). Changed comparison section to do 
00084  *          all comparisons on doubles.    
00085  *    - 06/15/04 RM changed output to return subset instead of marked list
00086  *    = 11/8/04 WSK simplified internals. Added '!=' case.
00087  */
00088 FC_ReturnCode fc_createThresholdSubset(
00089   FC_Variable variable,  /**< input - variable */
00090   char* compare_str,     /**< input - compare string (eg. "<","<=", etc.) */
00091   double ref_value,      /**< input - reference data value */
00092   char* subsetName,      /**< input - new subset's name */
00093   FC_Subset *subset      /**< output - subset with thresholded elements */
00094 ) {  
00095   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00096   int i;
00097   int numDataPoint, numComp;
00098   void *datap;
00099   double epsilon, minimum; 
00100   FC_DataType datatype;
00101   FC_AssociationType assoc;
00102   FC_Mesh mesh;
00103   // comparisons
00104   int (*compare)(double, double, double, double);
00105 
00106   // default return
00107   if (subset) 
00108     *subset = FC_NULL_SUBSET; 
00109    
00110   // check input (can't be a global var)
00111   if (!fc_isVariableValid(variable) || fc_isVariableGlobal(variable) ||
00112       !compare_str || !subsetName || !subset) {
00113     fc_printfErrorMessage("%s", fc_getReturnCodeText(FC_INPUT_ERROR));
00114     return FC_INPUT_ERROR;
00115   }
00116 
00117   // determine comparison
00118   if (!strcmp(compare_str, "=") || !strcmp(compare_str, "=="))
00119     compare = fc_eq;
00120   else if (!strcmp(compare_str, "!=") || !strcmp(compare_str, "=!"))
00121     compare = fc_neq;
00122   else if (!strcmp(compare_str, "<"))
00123     compare = fc_lt;
00124   else if (!strcmp(compare_str, "<=") || !strcmp(compare_str, "=<"))
00125     compare = fc_lteq;
00126   else if (!strcmp(compare_str, ">"))
00127     compare = fc_gt;
00128   else if (!strcmp(compare_str, ">=") || !strcmp(compare_str, "=>"))
00129     compare = fc_gteq;
00130   else {
00131     fc_printfErrorMessage("Unknown comparison string: '%s'", compare_str);
00132     return FC_INPUT_ERROR;
00133   }
00134 
00135   // log message
00136   fc_printfLogMessage("Creating new threshold subset '%s'", subsetName);
00137 
00138   // get variable info
00139   rc = fc_getVariableInfo(variable, &numDataPoint, &numComp, &assoc, NULL, 
00140                  &datatype);
00141   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS)
00142     return rc;
00143 
00144   // more checking
00145   if (numComp > 1) {
00146      fc_printfErrorMessage("can only do variables with 1 component.");
00147     return FC_ERROR;
00148   }
00149   if (datatype == FC_DT_INT || datatype == FC_DT_DOUBLE) {
00150     epsilon = DBL_EPSILON;
00151     minimum = DBL_MIN;
00152   }
00153   else if (datatype == FC_DT_FLOAT) {
00154     epsilon = FLT_EPSILON;
00155     minimum = FLT_MIN;
00156   }
00157   else {
00158     fc_printfErrorMessage("Can't do data type '%s'.",
00159                  fc_getDataTypeText(datatype));
00160     return FC_ERROR;
00161   }
00162       
00163   rc = fc_getVariableDataPtr(variable, &datap);
00164   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00165     fc_printfErrorMessage("error getting data.");
00166     return rc;
00167   }  
00168   
00169   // get mesh that the variable belongs to
00170   rc = fc_getMeshFromVariable(variable, &mesh);
00171   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS)
00172     return rc;
00173   // create new subset
00174   rc = fc_createSubset(mesh, subsetName, assoc, &(*subset));
00175   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS)
00176     return rc;
00177 
00178   // determine subset members
00179   for (i = 0; i < numDataPoint; i++) {
00180     double value;
00181     if (datatype == FC_DT_INT)
00182       value = ((int*)datap)[i];
00183     else if (datatype == FC_DT_FLOAT)
00184       value = ((float*)datap)[i];
00185     else if (datatype == FC_DT_DOUBLE)
00186       value = ((double*)datap)[i];
00187     if (compare(value, ref_value, epsilon, minimum))
00188       fc_addMemberToSubset(*subset, i);
00189   }
00190 
00191   return FC_SUCCESS;
00192 }
00193 
00194 
00195 /**
00196  * \ingroup  Threshold
00197  * \brief Create subset according to range conditions.
00198  *
00199  * \description
00200  * 
00201  *     Creates a subset of the entities that pass the test specified
00202  *     by the given range condition; that is the reference variable
00203  *     satisfies two comparisons connected by
00204  *     a logical operator. Comparisons are defined by a string,
00205  *     with possible values: <b> compare = ">",">=",
00206  *     "==","<","<=", "!=" </b>. The operation string connecting
00207  *     the two comparisons can be: <b> operation = "OR"="or"="||",
00208  *     "AND"="and"="&&"="&","XOR"="xor"="^" (exclusive or) </b>.
00209  *
00210  *     Example:  to get the range ((var >= a) && (var < b)) 
00211  *       - fc_markThresholdedRange(var, ">=", a, "&&", "<", "b", &subsetName, 
00212  *         &subset);
00213  *
00214  * \modifications 
00215  *    - Nancy Collins  Created.
00216  *    - 11/26/03 WSK added return of association type & cleaned up
00217  *    - 04/12/04 RM, rewritten, added comparison strings to input argument 
00218  *         list and an operation string to link both comparisons.
00219  *         f.e. we can now check condition:
00220  *          variable "<" reference1  &&  variable ">=" reference2.
00221  *    - 06/25/04 RM changed to operate on subsets and return subset 
00222  *               instead of marked list  
00223  */
00224 FC_ReturnCode fc_createThresholdRangeSubset(
00225   FC_Variable variable,/**< input - variable */
00226   char* compare1,    /**< input - comparison (string eg.">") with reference1*/
00227   double ref_value1, /**< input - reference data value                      */
00228   char* operation,   /**< input - operation that links the two comparisons
00229                eg. "OR","AND","XOR", "||","&&" etc.       */
00230   char* compare2,    /**< input - comparison (eg."<=") with reference2      */
00231   double ref_value2, /**< input - reference data value                      */
00232   char* subsetName,  /**< input - new subset's name                       */
00233   FC_Subset *subset  /**< output - subset with thresholded elements       */
00234 ) {
00235   FC_ReturnCode rc ;
00236   FC_Subset subset1;
00237   FC_Subset subset2;
00238   char *subset1Name = "temp_subset", *subset2Name ="temp_subset";
00239 
00240   // default return
00241   if (subset) 
00242     *subset = FC_NULL_SUBSET; 
00243    
00244   // check input
00245   if (!fc_isVariableValid(variable) || fc_isVariableGlobal(variable) ||
00246       !compare1 || !operation || !compare2 || !subsetName || !subset) {
00247     fc_printfErrorMessage("%s", fc_getReturnCodeText(FC_INPUT_ERROR));
00248     return FC_INPUT_ERROR;
00249   }
00250 
00251   // log message
00252   fc_printfLogMessage("Creating new threshold range subset '%s'",
00253                 subsetName);
00254 
00255   // for each comparison call fc_getThreshSubset() function, creating new
00256   // subsets, then perform operation on the two subsets  
00257   rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(variable, compare1, ref_value1, subset1Name,
00258                     &subset1);
00259   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) 
00260     return rc;
00261   
00262   rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(variable, compare2, ref_value2, subset2Name, 
00263                     &subset2);
00264   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00265     fc_deleteSubset(subset1);
00266     return rc;
00267   }
00268 
00269   // perform desired operation on the two subsets
00270   rc = fc_createSubsetIntersection(subset1, operation, subset2, subsetName,
00271        subset);
00272 
00273   // delete temporary subsets
00274   fc_deleteSubset(subset1);
00275   fc_deleteSubset(subset2);
00276 
00277   // report error of intersection operation
00278   if (rc != FC_SUCCESS) {
00279     fc_printfErrorMessage("error creating subset intersection.");
00280     return rc;
00281   }  
00282  
00283   return FC_SUCCESS;
00284 }
